articles.description: La disminución y extinción de los glaciares abre masivamente la corteza que los subyace.

articles.title: After over €700m in investment, France scraps plans for 4th-gen nuke reactor
articles.description: The French nuclear agency has admitted it axed plans to build a prototype fast-breeder nuclear reactor - at least, in the foreseeable future - after spending over a decade and hundreds of million of euros on its development. Read Full Article at RT.com
articles.content: The decision to not build a prototype of any sort for the ASTRID project (Advanced Sodium Technological Reactor for Industrial Demonstration) was first reported by the French daily Le Monde on Friday. The French Alternative Energies and Atomic Energy Commissi… [+2430 chars]
